ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let bkurl=surl();
book.bookUrl=String(book.bookUrl).replace(/^https:\/\/[^\/]+/, bkurl);
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {
let tags=String.raw`{{@@.addtags>a:not(:last-of-type)@text##\n## #}}`;
tags=tags ? ('#'+tags+'\n') : '';
let jj=tags+java.get('jianjie')+`
{{@@.addtags~p@textNodes##`##\\`}}`.replace(/簡介：/,'');
result={
	jj:jj};

} else {
	let st=gets('.info@text');
	let sj=st.match(/创建于([\d\ \-\:]+)/)[1];
	let fm=gets('#classify_container li img.0@src');
	fm+=`,{headers:{referer:'${surl()}/'}}`;
	result={
	tags:sj,
	fm:fm};

}
</js>

ruleContent.content: let ref=surl()+'/'; let rr=result.match(/\/\/[^"\n]+\.(?:webp|jpg|png|jpeg)/g); for (let i=0;i` } rr.join('\n')

ruleSearch.author: @get:{anm}
ruleSearch.bookList:
let [key,page] = java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('🀄'); let url=surl(); if (key.startsWith('@')) { key=key.slice(1); java.put('sshj',key); url += '/q/?q='+key+'&m=&f=_all&s=create_time_DESC&p=1';} else if (/^[#＃]/.test(key)) { let webua=java.getWebViewUA(); key=key.slice(1); url += `/albums-index-page-${page}-tag-${key}.html,{headers:{User-Agent:"${webua}"}}`;} else if (/^■\d/.test(key)) { java.put('cos',1); let page2=((source.getLoginInfoMap()||{})['发现起始页数']||'1')+[]||'1'; //兼容null和java"" page=+page + +page2 - 1; if (page>3&&(page&1)==0&&page2>2) java.toast('第'+page+'页'); let webua=java.getWebViewUA(); key=key.slice(1); url += `/albums-index${page==1?'':('-page-'+page)}-cate-${key}.html,{headers:{User-Agent:"${webua}"}}`;} else { url+='/q/?q='+key+'&m=&f=_all&s=create_time_DESC&p='+page;} let webr=java.ajax(url); java.setContent(webr); result=java.getElement('#classify_container li'); let hj=java.get('sshj'); if (hj!=''&&result.length>1) { let st=java.getString('.info@text',result); let sj=st.match(/创建于([\d\ \-\:]+)/)[1]; let sl=st.match(/\d+(?=张图)/g); sl=sl.reduce((acc, cur)=>acc+Number(cur),0); let im=java.getString('img.0@all',result); let rr=`
  • ${sl}张图${sj}
    • +${im}`; result=[rr]; } else {java.put('sshj',''); result;}
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let url;
if (hj=='') url= surl()+java.getString('a@href');
else url=java.getString('a@href');
</js>
ruleSearch.intro:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)(?:(\[[^\[\]]+\])\s*)?/);
	if (nm) {result=nm[3]+(nm[4]?nm[4]:'');java.put('jianjie',result);}
	else result='';
	}
</js>
ruleSearch.kind:
<js>
	let rr = '{{@@li@class##cate-}}';
	let tt = `{{@@.info@text##([\d\-\s\:]{4,})$##$1###}}`;
	result=rr ? (flfl[rr][0]+','+tt) : tt;
</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let cos=java.get('cos');

if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)/);
	if(!nm&&cos==1) nm=rr.match(/(^.+)\s+[–\-]\s+(.+$)/);
	if (nm&&!/^3d$/i.test(nm[1])) {java.put('anm',nm[1]); result=nm[2];}
	else {java.put('anm',rr); result=rr;}
	}
else {java.put('anm','合集'); result='📚'+hj;}

result
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
if (hj=='') {result=[];}
else {
result=gets('.block-pagination a@href').split('\n');
result.push("data:;base64,aHR0,{'type':'ss'}");
}
result
</js>
